amendatorysection.chaptername: Cities and Villages; Laws Applicable to All
amendatorysection.para: Any city clerk who willfully refuses to comply with the provisions of sections 18-2501 to 18-2531 and 18-2538 or who willfully causes unreasonable delay in the execution of his or her duties under such sections shall be guilty of a Class I misdemeanor, but imprisonment shall not be included as part of the punishment.
